api_list.name: Get Country Code
api_list.description: Get list of all country codes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://eyecon.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getCountryCode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eyecon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://eyecon.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getCountryCode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eyecon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Contact
api_list.description: Search for the contact based on phone number and country code.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description:
use getCountryCode api to get country code.
Eg for
India: 91
USA: 1
Note: Please don't add leading + along with country code.
